Home.title: It's not just a website,
Home.desc: If you want to make the most of the benefits that an online presence can offer, I'm here to help turn that vision into reality.

About.desc: I've always been interested in IT and working with computers, so when I discovered programming I was hooked right away. I love working in high-performance projects and innovative technology initiatives. I'm proactive, great problem solving capacity and critical thinking. I'm very attentive to others and I have a clear verbal communication.
